nodes.text: The Poderis system was a star system in the Orus sector of the Inner Rim Territories that contained the planet of Poderis.

During the Thrawn campaign, Grand Admiral Thrawn used Poderis as a red herring to throw Luke Skywalker off in his search for the Empire's clone traffic. The Chimaera tried to intercept Skywalker's freighter in the Poderis system but the Jedi managed to escape using a Covert Shroud Maneuver.
